005454_test.captions: a person places her hands on her thighs, then drops to her right knee, then kneels and sits back on her heels for a moment before leaning forward, placing her right foot forward and then raising herself to a standing position while her left hand stays on her thigh and her right drops to her side. l
005454_test.captiont: a person is crouched and stands then resumes the crouched position.
005454_test.text1: get into the squat position instead of laying the knees on the floor
005454_test.text2: keep the hands closer to the ground
005454_test.text3: sit down with the left leg in front instead of the right one
005454_test.text4: sit on both knees instead of just one
005454_test.text5: kneel down a bit faster, look down
005454_test.text6: start by already being seated, don't get up

005790_test.captions: a figure is kneeling and seems to be brushing something off
005790_test.captiont: a person get up and bend on the knee
005790_test.text1: start from the standing position. don't move your arms, just rest them on your thighs. don't put your right knee down
005790_test.text2: start with standing up and then perform the action
005790_test.text3: start from a squat and don't get up
005790_test.text4: don't go all the way down and move the right hand to the left knee
005790_test.text6: don't move your right hand and stay in the crouching position with your back straight

002681_test.captions: a person is waving with his right hand and then the left one.
002681_test.captiont: a man moves his right arm side to side than shakes his left hand and moves it side to side.
002681_test.text2: do the arm motion sooner and lower.
002681_test.text3: don't extend leg and don't turn left
002681_test.text4: do the motion to the left not forward
002681_test.text5: don't turn and make a small step back
002681_test.text6: don't shift weight onto right leg

002930_test.captions: puts arms straight out, then back down, then makes his head go side to side, and then he does circles with his head.
002930_test.captiont: the man lowers his arms and looks around in a circle motion.
002930_test.text1: don't just move head from left to right rotate it clockwise and keep hands on the side
002930_test.text4: start with arms already relaxed. don't raise arms
002930_test.text5: don't raise hands at the end
002930_test.text6: rotate hands in the opposite direction

003001_test.captions: a person does neck exercises by rolling their head from right to left, then around in a circle.
003001_test.captiont: the man is moving his arms
003001_test.text1: keeping hands fixed tilt head left then right then return to center and rotate neck anticlockwise
003001_test.text3: don't move the arms at all instead stay still
003001_test.text4: look straight and keep arms down
003001_test.text5: look up, start with arms to the sides, don't do the final arm movement
003001_test.text6: don't move head and keep the hands closer to the hips

003007_test.captions: a person stands still, swinging their head around.
003007_test.captiont: a man puts both arms down and moves his head side to side and in a circular motion.
003007_test.text1: start by tilting head to the right and then rotate neck anticlockwise once
003007_test.text2: look straight ahead instead of down
003007_test.text4: keep looking in the same direction and don't move head
003007_test.text5: don't lean your head back as much
003007_test.text6: don't move the head instead just relax the head and do a very mild clockwise circular motion

003026_test.captions: a person standing upright, arms at sides; their leans toward right then left two times, next they do two neck rolls in a counterclockwise direction.
003026_test.captiont: the man is moving his arms
003026_test.text1: first tilt neck on the left return to center then rotate anticlockwise from the left
003026_test.text2: don't look back and keep the head straight
003026_test.text3: don't lean your head down as much
003026_test.text5: don't lean your head and upper body so much forward
003026_test.text6: don't move head but slightly tilt it to the left then to the right

002649_test.captions: a person grabbed something and start dancing with someone
002649_test.captiont: the person is doing a fancy dance.
002649_test.text1: turn around after the first step to the right
002649_test.text4: don't lean your upper body and do the jumping jacks on the spot with the legs not in place
002649_test.text5: do the first sidestep later and keep head up
002649_test.text6: move two steps to the left before turning

003873_test.captions: a man sits down before standing back up.
003873_test.captiont: a person sits down on the ground and crosses their legs, then stands up
003873_test.text1: look to the left instead of right while sitting down
003873_test.text2: start putting butt on the floor a little earlier

002858_test.captions: a person with hands by their head bends down to tie their left shoe.
002858_test.captiont: a person squats, pauses then starts to stand back up.
002858_test.text1: don't get up right knee at the level of left knees hands on the knees
002858_test.text4: start by getting into the crawling position, keep the crawling position and then get up
002858_test.text5: keep the left hand closer to the body and get up slower
002858_test.text6: don't get up at the end

004538_test.captions: a person lifts both arms and claps his hands together and then repeats the action several times.
004538_test.captiont: a person holds their hands up to their face shaking slightly, as if crying.
004538_test.text1: not clapping just right hand to face
004538_test.text2: look more up and spread legs a bit wider
004538_test.text3: start with arms spread to the sides and bring them together
004538_test.text6: don't clap instead just keep the hands in front of the chin

004127_test.captions: a person energetically bounces up and down to loosen their muscles.
004127_test.captiont: a person stands still with their weight resting on their left leg
004127_test.text2: start jumping a bit later and slower
004127_test.text3: don't jump and look straight ahead
004127_test.text4: don't jump and swing to the side
004127_test.text5: don't jump on the spot instead just look down
004127_test.text6: don't alternate legs and keep the head up

004419_test.captions: a person puts their right hand in the air and makes a slapping motion
004419_test.captiont: a person waves with their right hand.
004419_test.text1: when performing the clap keep your elbow up make the motion more gentle
004419_test.text3: start with your right arm up
004419_test.text4: do a counterclockwise circle with right arm instead
004419_test.text5: wave right hand faster and slower
004419_test.text6: wave slower and in a bigger motion

000219_test.captions: a person quickly walks across the room.
000219_test.captiont: a person is walking in a circle.
000219_test.text1: Take smaller careless steps instead of hasty.
000219_test.text6: take a shorter step when turning

003795_test.captions: a person crawls forwards on their hands and knees, turns around, then stands up and faces left.
003795_test.captiont: someone crouches and crawls and goes around
003795_test.text3: turn back a bit later and keep crawling in the forward direction instead of turning back
003795_test.text6: turn more to the right and get up

004008_test.captions: a person raised the hands and bend the body
004008_test.captiont: a person bends down to touch their toes twice
004008_test.text1: do it faster and keep legs closer
004008_test.text3: start with your arms relaxed and bring them closer together. don't bend down at the end
004008_test.text4: start from a more forward bend position and don't step back
004008_test.text5: bend more from the back and keep hands straight and bring them closer
004008_test.text6: bend more from back and keep hands closer

003304_test.captions: the sim appears to pick up a phone, bringing it to their right ear.
003304_test.captiont: a person pouring something down and putting the object back
003304_test.text1: don't look in the right direction instead look forward and use only the left hand to pick up something instead of the both
003304_test.text2: keep the hand at the same level
003304_test.text3: face straight and move hand more actively
003304_test.text4: don't turn right, keep looking down and move right arm up to the left
003304_test.text5: bend your back more and reach with your right hand instead of left
003304_test.text6: do the up and down motion with the left hand instead of the right hand

002924_test.captions: the person did an ankle twist with his left foot and then did an ankle twist with his right foot.
002924_test.captiont: a person bends down and jumps up 3 times with arms swaying.
002924_test.text1: don't just lift left legs jump with both legs up
002924_test.text3: don't step forward, keep looking at your hands
002924_test.text4: keep the left leg lower, turn body to the right
002924_test.text5: don't jump on the spot instead just raise left leg and right leg twice
002924_test.text6: keep left leg lower and do a kick with each jump and lean left

001137_test.captions: a person turns and does a small jog to their left and then their right before ending up in the space place they started.
001137_test.captiont: a person jogs back and forth dancing.
001137_test.text1: Jog a little big faster and take one more step before turning
001137_test.text2: walk with your legs wider apart and lose your balance in the end
001137_test.text4: don't move the right hand and take a step on the left side
001137_test.text6: keep hands at back of the body and take one step front and make a 180 degree turn

002680_test.captions: a person is waving with his right hand and then the left one.
002680_test.captiont: a person waves with their left hand twice and waves a big wave with both in the end
002680_test.text1: delay wave slightly and move arm much slower
002680_test.text3: keep the hand raised longer and move it in a leftward direction instead of forward
002680_test.text4: keep the hand raised at the end
002680_test.text5: start with the arm already extended forward
002680_test.text6: wave in a slower and wider motion

000524_test.captions: a man takes a step backward, sits down, stands back up and take a step forward to his original position.
000524_test.captiont: walking to the side then sitting down and walking back.
000524_test.text1: keep hands placed outside of the hips.
000524_test.text5: do a high-five at the end
000524_test.text6: don't move the hands at all and keep them on the side

003497_test.captions: a person sits down and crosses its legs, then gets back up.
003497_test.captiont: a figure backs up and sits down.
003497_test.text1: keep the legs straight instead of crossing the left leg on the right one
003497_test.text2: keep hands closer to the body
003497_test.text4: don't keep the left leg on the right one after standing up
003497_test.text5: raise the left leg and right leg in turn instead of keeping them fixed in the air
003497_test.text6: start by already sitting down and don't get up

004621_test.captions: a person sits in a chair
004621_test.captiont: a person sits down with hands by his side
004621_test.text1: sit straight instead of swinging on the chair
004621_test.text2: keep the right knee lower, on the same level as the left knee
004621_test.text3: keep the body straight and don't move the legs
004621_test.text5: don't move your head and twitch your leg slightly in the end
004621_test.text6: keep the left leg at the same level as the right leg and lean on the back of the chair

004977_test.captions: the toon appears to be grabbing a office chair, taking a seat and raising their legs before reclining.
004977_test.captiont: a person sits down with hands by his side
004977_test.text2: start the motion by already sitting down
004977_test.text3: bring legs closer together and look straight ahead
004977_test.text4: keep sitting in the same position, don't get up
004977_test.text5: start from a seated position with legs crossed and then do the previous motion but with the other leg

002078_test.captions: a person walks backwards and stops.
002078_test.captiont: a person takes four steps backwards and then stops.

001259_test.captions: a figure shakes itself a little loose then does squats with arms out forward
001259_test.captiont: a person squats down and holds out their arms
001259_test.text4: don't squat as deep, keep head up
001259_test.text5: bend more on the knees and keep the back straight

004034_test.captions: a person with their hands up turns their torso to the left and then stretches their body to the right and then to the left before bending down to touch their toes
004034_test.captiont: a person swing the upper core body while raised the hands
004034_test.text1: continue upper body turns instead of tilting move slower
004034_test.text3: raise both arms up at the end instead of just right arm
004034_test.text4: don't lean to the right and rotate the right arm in a way that it faces downwards instead of keeping it straight
004034_test.text5: do the action with the opposite side first
004034_test.text6: don't bend to the left at the end

002332_test.captiont: a person uses hands to eat soup.
002332_test.text1: don't throw punches just slowly raise hands in front instead
002332_test.text3: keep the hands closer to the body
002332_test.text4: keep the left hand parallel to the ground and right hand above the left shoulder and do the whole motion in reverse
002332_test.text5: don't swing so wide, swing down and to the right at the end

002081_test.captions: a person slowly walks in a counterclockwise circle.
002081_test.captiont: person walks around in a circle at normal speed
002081_test.text2: turn on a slightly more open arc
002081_test.text4: take one step back before turning

000081_test.captions: a person walks backward and crouches down to crouch walk.
000081_test.captiont: a person sits down in a chair and then gets back up.
000081_test.text1: sit a bit higher taking one less step
000081_test.text2: walk three steps back before sitting
000081_test.text4: keep the left knee at the same level as the right one and get up at the end
000081_test.text6: don't squat as low and look forward

000052_test.captions: the person walks in a circle counter clock wise.
000052_test.captiont: a person walking in an anti-clockwise circular pattern
000052_test.text3: keep your head straight and do a smaller turn
000052_test.text4: step over the object instead of around it
000052_test.text5: take more steps and turn on a more closed arc

002818_test.captions: this person is hoping around and kicking.
002818_test.captiont: someone tryiing to fight while moving his body
002818_test.text1: kick with the other leg towards the opposite side
002818_test.text2: kick in the opposite direction with the opposite leg and look straight
002818_test.text3: kick from a higher position and don't turn to the side
002818_test.text4: don't rotate the left and do a roundhouse kick to the left
002818_test.text5: kick in the opposite direction and don't turn around
002818_test.text6: start the motion with your opposite leg in the front and kick twice before turning around

001468_test.captions: a person jumps sideways to the left with both feet.
001468_test.captiont: the person is jumping over to the side.
001468_test.text5: do the jump to the left
